AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Area Not Duplicated
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_area_id not in (select sfb_budget_area_id from sfb_budget_user_area where ad_user_id = @AD_User_ID@ and sfb_budget_area_id is not null and (sfb_budget_area_id <> @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@ or @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@ IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice Line Certificate Line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_cert_line_id in (case when (select isreversal from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (select c_doctypetarget_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) = 'Y' AND (select docbasetype from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (select c_doctypetarget_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) = 'APC' then (select sfb_budget_cert_line_id from sfb_budget_cert_line bcl left join sfb_budget_certificate bc on bcl.sfb_budget_certificate_id = bc.sfb_budget_certificate_id left join c_year cy on bc.c_year_id = cy.c_year_id where bc.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and bc.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and bc.hash_code = coalesce(@EM_Sfb_Hashcode@, (select em_sfb_hashcode from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) and bc.process = 'Y' and bcl.c_costcenter_id = coalesce(@C_Costcenter_ID@, (select c_costcenter_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) and bcl.user1_id = coalesce(@User1_ID@, (select user1_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) and cast(cy.year as double precision) = extract(year from to_date(@DateInvoiced@)) and bc.c_currency_id = @C_Currency_ID@ ) else (select sfb_budget_cert_line_id from sfb_budget_cert_line bcl left join sfb_budget_certificate bc on bcl.sfb_budget_certificate_id = bc.sfb_budget_certificate_id left join c_year cy on bc.c_year_id = cy.c_year_id where bc.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and bc.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and bc.hash_code = coalesce(@EM_Sfb_Hashcode@, (select em_sfb_hashcode from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) and bc.process = 'Y' and bcl.c_costcenter_id = coalesce(@C_Costcenter_ID@, (select c_costcenter_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) and bcl.user1_id = coalesce(@User1_ID@, (select user1_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = @C_Invoice_ID@)) and bcl.actual_value > 0 and cast(cy.year as double precision) = extract(year from to_date(@DateInvoiced@)) and bc.c_currency_id = @C_Currency_ID@ ) end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Item by Area
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id in (select sfb_budget_item_id from sfb_budget_area_item where sfb_budget_area_id = @SFB_Budget_Area_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Document Types
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('API','APC','POO','APP','GLJ') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='N' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@#AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@#AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Journal Budget
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_cert_line_id in (select sfb_budget_cert_line_id from sfb_budget_cert_line bcl left join sfb_budget_certificate bc on bcl.sfb_budget_certificate_id = bc.sfb_budget_certificate_id left join c_year cy on bc.c_year_id = cy.c_year_id where bc.hash_code = @EM_Sfb_Hashcode@ and bc.process = 'Y' and bcl.c_costcenter_id = @C_Costcenter_ID@ and cast(cy.year as double precision) = extract(year from to_date(@Dateacct@)) and bcl.actual_value > 0)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Item
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id in (select bl.sfb_budget_item_id from sfb_budget_line bl left join sfb_budget_version bv on bl.sfb_budget_version_id = bv.sfb_budget_version_id left join sfb_budget b on bv.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id where bl.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and bl.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and ((@Type@ = 'M' or @Type@ = 'S') and bl.c_costcenter_id = @C_Costcenter_ID@ or @Type@ = 'A' and bl.c_costcenter_id = @C_Costcenter_To_ID@) and ((@Type@ = 'M' or @Type@ = 'S') and bl.user1_id = @User1_ID@ or @Type@ = 'A' and bl.user1_id = @User1_To_ID@) and ((@Type@ = 'M' or @Type@ = 'S') and bl.sfb_budget_area_id = @SFB_Budget_Area_ID@ or @Type@ = 'A' and bl.sfb_budget_area_id = @SFB_Budget_Area_To_ID@) and bv.version_status = 'AP' and b.type_of_budget = @Type_Of_Budget@ and b.c_year_id = @C_Year_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Item Not Duplicated
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id not in (select sfb_budget_item_id from sfb_budget_area_item where sfb_budget_area_id = @SFB_Budget_Area_ID@ and sfb_budget_item_id is not null and (sfb_budget_item_id <> @SFB_Budget_Item_ID@ or @SFB_Budget_Item_ID@ IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Item Available Balance 2
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id in (select sfb_budget_area_item.sfb_budget_item_id from sfb_budget_area left join sfb_budget_area_item on sfb_budget_area_item.sfb_budget_item_id = sfb_budget_item_id where sfb_budget_area.sfb_budget_area_id = @SFB_Budget_Area_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Order Line Certificate Line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_cert_line_id in (select sfb_budget_cert_line_id from sfb_budget_cert_line bcl left join sfb_budget_certificate bc on bcl.sfb_budget_certificate_id = bc.sfb_budget_certificate_id left join c_year cy on bc.c_year_id = cy.c_year_id where bc.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and bc.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and bc.hash_code = coalesce(@EM_Sfb_Hashcode@, (select em_sfb_hashcode from c_order where c_order_id = @C_Order_ID@)) and bc.process = 'Y' and bcl.c_costcenter_id = coalesce(@C_Costcenter_ID@, (select c_costcenter_id from c_order where c_order_id = @C_Order_ID@)) and bcl.user1_id = coalesce(@User1_ID@, (select user1_id from c_order where c_order_id = @C_Order_ID@)) and bcl.available_balance > 0 and cast(cy.year as double precision) = extract(year from to_date(@DateOrdered@)) and bc.c_currency_id = @C_Currency_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Item Available Balance
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id in (select bl.sfb_budget_item_id from sfb_budget_line bl left join sfb_budget_version bv on bl.sfb_budget_version_id = bv.sfb_budget_version_id left join sfb_budget b on bv.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id where bl.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and bl.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and bl.c_costcenter_id = @C_Costcenter_ID@ and bl.user1_id = @User1_ID@ and bl.available_balance > 0 and bl.sfb_budget_area_id = @SFB_Budget_Area_ID@ and bv.version_status = 'AP' and b.type_of_budget = @Type_Of_Budget@ and b.c_year_id = @C_Year_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Budget Area
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_area_id in ( select sfb_budget_area_id from sfb_budget_user_area where ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: open_period
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM c_periodcontrol_log pc WHERE C_Period.C_Period_ID=pc.periodno AND pc.Periodaction='O')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payment Detail Certificate Line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_cert_line_id in (select sfb_budget_cert_line_id from sfb_budget_cert_line bcl left join sfb_budget_certificate bc on bcl.sfb_budget_certificate_id = bc.sfb_budget_certificate_id left join c_year cy on bc.c_year_id = cy.c_year_id where bc.ad_client_id = @AD_Client_ID@ and bc.ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@ and bc.hash_code = coalesce(@EM_Sfb_Hashcode@, (select em_sfb_hashcode from fin_payment where fin_payment_id = @FIN_Payment_ID@)) and bc.process = 'Y' and bcl.c_costcenter_id = coalesce(@EM_Sfb_C_Costcenter_ID@, (select c_costcenter_id from fin_payment where fin_payment_id = @FIN_Payment_ID@)) and bcl.user1_id = coalesce(@EM_Sfb_User1_ID@, (select user1_id from fin_payment where fin_payment_id = @FIN_Payment_ID@)) and bcl.actual_value > 0 and cast(cy.year as double precision) = extract(year from to_date(@Paymentdate@)) and bc.c_currency_id = @C_Currency_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Journal Budget Flopec
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_cert_line_id in (select sfb_budget_cert_line_id from sfb_budget_cert_line bcl left join sfb_budget_certificate bc on bcl.sfb_budget_certificate_id = bc.sfb_budget_certificate_id left join c_year cy on bc.c_year_id = cy.c_year_id where bc.hash_code = @EM_Sfb_Hashcode@ and bc.process = 'Y' and bcl.c_costcenter_id = @C_Costcenter_ID@ and cast(cy.year as double precision) = extract(year from to_date(@Dateacct@)) and ((TO_NUMBER (@AmtSourceCr@, '999,999,999.99')>0 and bcl.actual_value >= 0) OR (TO_NUMBER (@AmtSourceDr@, '999,999,999.99')>0 and bcl.actual_value >0 )))
